channel.title: Need Help , Fixed in 1 minute!
channel.description:
[b]Hello guys thanks for coming to this topic ![/b]
I'm new at the 508 sever hosting , so i hope you can help me :)
I started a sever one week ago , everything was working perfectly. Then i got a new source whit asome custom items, and i like it . but there is one problem my compiler isnt working ,
[b]Please some one , make a working compiler or fix it[/b]
I dont know what you need here is some information :
JDK version : [b]jdk1.6.0_18[/b] Compiler : [b]@echo off cd ../src color 0a Title Blastforce 508 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java pause[/b] Windows edition : [b]Windows 7[/b] [IMG]http://i1025.photobucket.com/albums/y313/merowio/Untitled.png[/img]
Compiler error : [IMG]http://i1025.photobucket.com/albums/y313/merowio/jkgkjgjk.png[/img]
Jdk Location : [IMG]http://i1025.photobucket.com/albums/y313/merowio/pic2.png[/img]
That was all the information If you need more say it ! Please help me ! [b] -Merowi0[/b]

item.title: Need Help , Fixed in 1 minute!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

its called windows 7 convertor. use the search thing i forgot teh link

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help , Fixed in 1 minute!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Okay lil-rmj failed…

Your compiler code

@echo off cd ../src color 0a Title Blastforce 508 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java pause

Is fine, but it cant find Engine.java in that location. You need to edit the ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
I’ve never worked with a codeusa package so I cant help further than that.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help , Fixed in 1 minute!
item.dc:creator: @merowi0 merowi0
item.description:
@merowi0 wrote:

[quote=“lil-rmj, post:2, topic:336041”]try this
@echo off
cd …/src
color 0a
Title Blastforce 508
“C:\Program Files (x86) \Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
pause

if not have u tried just getting rid of this
…/build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java ?[/quote]

Thanks for Responding

I tried it but it gives this :

The system cannot find the path specified

please help me

-merowi0

Read full topic
